author: mfreedman
msg: PortletBridge-33:  Redirect during action causes infinite loop if action/render run in same request
Fix was to remove the redirect request attribute before returning from the action

author: dims
msg: Find the factory class properly, don't relay on the fact that it will always be at index 0

author: vborja
msg: Don't print ugly stacktraces, just exit cleanly.
Thanks Alexis Midon for your comments on buildr-git.rb
